title: Train services affected due to train fault between Caldecott and Gardens by the Bay

title_translations.zh-Hans: 加德纳地铁站至体育城地铁站之间因列车故障影响列车服务
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan kereta api terjejas disebabkan oleh kerosakan kereta api antara Caldecott dan Gardens by the Bay
title_translations.ta: கல்கோட் மற்றும் கார்டன்ஸ் பை தி பே இடையே ரயில் பழுது காரணமாக ரயில் சேவைகள் பாதிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளன

updates.text: [TEL]: Due to a train fault, trains are moving slower from Orchard towards Orchard Boulevard. Additional Travelling time of 10mins.
[TEL]: Train services recovering between Caldecott and Gardens by the Bay. Free Bus and Bus Bridging still available between Caldecott and Gardens by the bay.
[TEL]: Due to a train fault, train services between Caldecott and Gardens by the Bay are affected.
